channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Decent homes standard for UK private renters delayed by government till 2035
item.description: Campaigners pushing for 2030 deadline said deferral was ‘denying renters the most basic standards in our homes’ UK politics live – latest updates The ...

item.title: Threat of US-Iran war escalates as Trump warns time running out for deal
item.description: US president says armada heading towards Iran is ‘prepared to fulfil its missions with violence if necessary’ The threat of a US-Iranian war may be lo...

item.title: Greenland standoff was ‘strategic wake-up call’ for Europe, says Macron – Europe live
item.description: French president says ‘Greenland is not for sale’ at meeting with Danish and Greenlandic prime ministers in Paris in Paris In other news, a former Fre...

item.title: Trump continues to rail against Ilhan Omar after Minneapolis town hall attack – live
item.description: Trump calls Minnesota congresswoman a ‘fraud’ who ‘probably had herself sprayed’; Omar says ‘I don’t let bullies win’ in remarks after town hall attac...

item.title: Labour movement ‘on the line’ because of Starmer’s mistakes, says union boss – UK politics live
item.description: Starmer’s ‘control freakery’ could end up leading Nigel Farage into No 10, Unison boss Andrea Egan says Badenoch is now taking questions. Asked if she...

item.title: Top private school 'failed to protect pupils' from sexual and physical abuse
item.description: Children at ex-prime minister Tony Blair's former school, Fettes College in Edinburgh, were abused by both teachers and other pupils over decades.

item.title: China trip will bring benefits to UK, Starmer insists, ahead of Xi meeting
item.description: The prime minister seeks to strengthen ties with China but faces fierce criticism from opponents at home.

item.title: US YouTube star IShowSpeed to get Ghanaian passport as Africa tour ends
item.description: Ghana's foreign minister says the influencer is a "worthy ambassador", but some Ghanaians criticised the move.

item.title: Is the US preparing to strike Iran?
item.description: Satellite images show a steady and significant build-up of US military forces in the region.

item.title: Ex-Spandau Ballet star Ross Davidson guilty of rape
item.description: Ross Davidson, known as Ross Wild on stage, was known for singing with the 80s band Spandau Ballet.
